section.name: selfdiagnose.xml (example)
section.source:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<selfdiagnose xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://selfdiagnose.sourceforge.net/selfdiagnose-2.4.xsd">
<tasks> <checkresourceproperty name="some.properties" key="some" comment="explain this check"/> </tasks> </selfdiagnose>
